body_html: After checking once more all the installed packages, I found out that somehow by mistake I installed Tensorflow for CPU. By uninstalling the tensorflow and installing tensorflow-gpu the problem is solved.
body_text: After checking once more all the installed packages, I found out that somehow by mistake I installed Tensorflow for CPU. By uninstalling the tensorflow and installing tensorflow-gpu the problem is solved.
body: After checking once more all the installed packages, I found out that somehow by mistake I installed Tensorflow for CPU. By uninstalling the tensorflow and installing tensorflow-gpu the problem is solved.
